tool_description: Look up location information for any valid IP address. This tool provides details such as the geographical location, ISP, and other relevant data associated with the IP address.

api_list.name: v1/iplookup
api_list.description: API Ninjas IP Lookup API endpoint for retrieving location information based on an IP address.

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: IP Address to query. Must be in the format A.B.C.D. For example: 73.9.149.180
